original_text: I want to know Christ—yes, to know the power of his resurrection and participation in his sufferings, becoming like him in his death,
korean_text: 내가 그리스도와 그 부활의 권능과 그 고난에 참여함을 알고자 하여 그의 죽으심을 본받아

sentences.original_text: to know the power of his resurrection
becoming like him in his death,
sentences.korean_translation: 그분의 죽음에 있어서 그분과 같이 되고 싶습니다
